text:
BURBANK, CALIFORNIA – APRIL 09: Singer Ariana Grande performs onstage during the 2016 MTV Movie Awards at Warner Bros. Studios on April 9, 2016 in Burbank, California. MTV Movie Awards airs April 10, 2016 at 8pm ET/PT. (Photo by Kevork Djansezian/Getty Images)

Pete Davidson's Instagram account took an interesting turn yesterday.

The Saturday Night Live star shared a photo on his account while standing next to Brian Tyree Henry.

The caption was interesting to say the least.

Davidson joked he was having Henry's kids.

But, things got even more interesting in the comment section.

Ariana Grande commented that SHE looked good in the pic.

Let's look at the photo again, shall we?

Oh that's right, Grande isn't in the picture.

So she must be insinuating Davidson should have kids with her.

Davidson seemed to like this notion, and commented with drooling emoji.

Kids these days ...

While their relationship is very new, we have to admit, Davidson and Grande would have cute babies.
title: Pete Davidson And Ariana Grande Are Already Talking About Having Kids
